apps.localizedDescription:
It is an ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support.

What can this app do:
â€¢ Download in the background
â€¢ Sequential download (use VLC to watch films while loading)
â€¢ Add torrent files from Share menu (Safari and other apps)

â€¢ Download torrent by magnet
â€¢ Send notification on torrent downloaded
â€¢ WebDav Server
